title: BESPOKED Dresden, Europe’s Largest Handmade Bicycle Show Begins Tomorrow, 18-20 October 2024
content:
BESPOKED‘s 2nd Annual European show will on once again take place at the Dresden & expected to be the largest in the event’s 13-year history. We’ll be there documenting the showcase…

Long established in the UK as Europe’s premier handmade bicycle exhibition, BESPOKED offers visitors the chance to meet and speak with some of the world’s most innovative frame builders. More than just a show for handmade bicycles, BESPOKED caters to both seasoned enthusiasts and those simply curious about beautiful machines and original designs.

In addition to the hand-built bikes on display, the weekend will feature a full line-up of talks, industry awards, group rides, and culinary delights.

This year’s program includes:

  • Over 130 of the world’s finest handmade bicycle, accessory, and component manufacturers
  • The BESPOKED x SRAM Inclusivity Scholarship
  • The prestigious BESPOKED Awards, judged by independent industry professionals
  • Talks from leading bicycle designers, riders, and builders sharing their unique perspectives
  • A program of short independent films, including CAMERA CORNER
  • Saturday after-party and gold sprints at Groovestation

Tickets and Opening Times

Advance tickets are available at www.bespoked.cc/tickets/ with weekend passes priced at €15 and day passes at €12 (children under 16 attend for free). Tickets at the door will be subject to availability and will be an additional €5 compared to the advance price.

Public Opening Times:

Friday 18th: 16:00 – 22:00
Saturday 19th: 10:00 – 18:00
Sunday 20th: 10:00 – 16:00
